alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 22 at 2:52PM MST until February 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Southwest and south central New Mexico including portions of Sierra, Dona Ana, Luna, Hidalgo, and Grant Counties and west El Paso County in far west Texas. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will make driving hazardous, especially along north/south roads and highways. Areas of blowing dust are also likely which will cause quickly changing visibilities for motorists.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
